title: Death of a Fop
description: This is a tribute to Jane Austen; after the events of her 'Emma', though the main protagonists might live happily ever after, Jane Fairfax Churchill has a less idyllic life and after her husband is murdered finds that she needs to help Bow Street Runner Caleb Armitage to track down her husband's killer and find out what was going on.
author: Sarah J. Waldock
